description:
The four Arayashiki leaders represent the Four Symbols of the Chinese constellation, corresponding to the four mythological creatures.
The creature of the South is Suzaku (朱雀), the Vermilion Bird.
Suzaku is hesitant about how to proceed and prefers to wait and see. She considers http://anidb.net/ch40602 [Seiryuu]`s plan of using http://anidb.net/ch5895 [Kyouta] as mindbreaker the perhaps only way of retrieving http://anidb.net/ch40649 [Benzaiten] but fears that the boy would be no match for http://anidb.net/ch40680 [Saraswati] yet, and premature action would only make things worse now.
name: Arayashiki South
